titleStmt.title: Wycklyffes wycket whyche he made in Kyng Rycards daye the second in the yere of our lorde God M.CCCCCV.
titleStmt.author: Wycliffe, John, d. 1384.
Tracy, William, d. 1530. Testament of master Wylliam Tracie esquier.
Tyndale, William, d. 1536.
Frith, John, 1503-1533.

notesStmt.note: Imprint false; place and date of publication from colophon; actual place of publication from and printer's name conjectured by STC.
The Tyndale section of the Tracy portion is reprinted from STC 24167: Tracy, William. The testament of master Wylliam Tracie esquier, expounded both by W. Tindall and J. Frith.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
